S

save() - Method in class Manager.BookingManager
This method calls the save method in userManager to save all the updates made.
save() - Method in class Manager.HallManager
Write all the updated hallList into the file path.
save() - Method in class Manager.MovieManager
This method saves the movieList to the file path.
save() - Method in class Manager.ShowtimeManager
This method saves the updated showtimeList to the file path.
save() - Method in class Manager.UserManager
Method to write any updates to the User Lists into a file and stored when the Application // terminates.
searchMovies(String) - Method in class UI
Takes in the Customer Choice of Movie and prints out all the information regarding the movie title selected.
setOverallRating() - Method in class Manager.MovieManager
This method sets the overall rating of all movies.
setOverallRating(Movie) - Method in class Manager.MovieManager
This method sets the overall rating for a particular movie.
setPHDay(String) - Method in class Manager.ShowtimeManager
This method allows the adding of public holiday.
Showtime - Class in Entities
Represents a showtime for each Movie.
Showtime(String, String, String, String, int) - Constructor for class Entities.Showtime
Create a new Showtime listing for each movie when given title, showtime, day, hallCode, maxCapacity.
SHOWTIME_PATH - Static variable in class Manager.ShowtimeManager
 
ShowtimeManager - Class in Manager
Represents the ShowtimeManager of MoblimaApp that handles the creating, updating, removing of showtimes.
